itemLabel: Albert Hilton, Baron Hilton of Upton

wikipedia_page.main: Albert Victor Hilton, Baron Hilton of Upton, JP (14 February 1908 – 3 May 1977) was a British farm labourer and trade union official who became a Labour Party Member of Parliament and later life peer.
